uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.awtlayout

Class AtomLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.awtlayout.AbstractAWTLayout<org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom>
      • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.awtlayout.AtomLayout

  • public class AtomLayout
extends AbstractAWTLayout<org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom>
    Layout an atom's symbol, and surrounding annotations, such as : charge, implicit hydrogens, etc.
    Author:
    maclean
